member.name: T:Formulacrum.NodeExt
member.summary: Extension methods for Formulacrum.Node.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeExt.Apply(Formulacrum.Node,Formulacrum.BinaryOperatorNode,Formulacrum.Node)
member.summary: Sets the arguments of the given binary operator to the given nodes, and returns the binary operator node.
member.remarks: This method can be used for convenience to allow nodes for binary operators to be used in infix notation in source code, rather than the default prefix notation.
member.exception: Thrown if is null.

member.summary: Creates a new function node with the given properties.

member.summary: Returns a new node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.

member.name: T:Formulacrum.GroupNode
member.summary: Formula node representing pair of grouping symbols.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.GroupNode.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new group node with the given properties.
member.param: A user-fiendly name for the node.
member.exception: Thrown if or are null or empty.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.Children
member.summary: Collection of child nodes.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.OpenSymbol
member.summary: Gets the opening symbol.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.CloseSymbol
member.summary: Gets the closing symbol.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.IndentSymbol
member.summary: Symbol to user for outline indenting. Defaults to (tab).
member.exception: Value cannot be null.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the child node at the given index.
member.exception: Thrown if index is negative or >= Children.Count.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.Count
member.summary: Gets the current number of child nodes (including nulls).

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.MinCount
member.summary: Gets the minimum number of child nodes.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.GroupNode.MaxCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of child nodes.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.GroupNode.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders node as a formula, using given outline setting.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation.
member.remarks: This will recursively call Render on all child nodes, and their children, etc. Result will be , followed by a comma-separated list of each child rendered, followed by .
member.example: If grp is new GroupNode("Paren", "(", ")").SetArgs(null, null), then grp.Formula returns "(NULL,NULL)".

member.name: M:Formulacrum.GroupNode.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.GroupNode.SetCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: If given count is between MinCount and MaxCount, clears all child nodes and sets child count to given value, then returns this node.
member.exception: Thrown if given count is negative or >= Count.
member.remarks: All elements will be null after calling this method.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.GroupNode.SetValues(Formulacrum.Node[])
member.summary: If number of given nodes is between MinCount and MaxCount, clears all elements, sets Count the number of given values, sets this all child nodes to the given nodes, and returns this node.
member.exception: values
Thrown if number of values is not between MinCount and MaxCount.

member.summary: Type that can be rendered as an Excel formula.

member.summary: Returns the instance rendered as an Excel formula.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation.

member.name: T:Formulacrum.Node
member.summary: Base class for formula nodes.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.Node.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new node with the given name.
member.exception: name

member.name: P:Formulacrum.Node.Name
member.summary: Gets the node name.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.Node.Children
member.summary: Gets the collection of child nodes.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.Node.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.Node.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders node as a formula, using given outline setting.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation.
member.remarks: This will recursively call Render on all child nodes, and their children, etc.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.Node.ToString
member.summary: Returns the rendered formula, without outline formatting.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.Node.Render(Formulacrum.Node,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the rendered formula of the given node, or "NULL" if the node is null.
member.param: If true , formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation.
member.returns: Rendered formula of given node, or "NULL".

member.name: T:Formulacrum.NodeCollection
member.summary: Resizable collection of nodes.

member.name: F:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.CountLimit
member.summary: The highest number of elements possible.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance, with the given size limits.
member.param: Starting size, and smallest size collection can be resized to.
Largest size collection can be resized to.
member.exception: Throw if minCount is negative, maxCount is above CountLimit, or maxCount is below minCount.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.MinCount
member.summary: Gets the smallest size the collection can be resized to.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.MaxCount
member.summary: Gets the largest size the collection can be resized to.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the current collection size.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the node at the given index.
member.exception: Thrown if index is negative or >= Count.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Iterates through each node.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.SetValues(Formulacrum.Node[])
member.summary: If number of given nodes is between MinCount and MaxCount, clears all elements, resizes the collection to the number of given values, and sets this collection's elements to the given nodes.
member.exception: values
Thrown if number of values is not between MinCount and MaxCount.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.SetCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: If given count is between MinCount and MaxCount, clears all elements and resizes collection to the given count.
member.exception: Thrown if number of values is not between MinCount and MaxCount.
member.remarks: All elements will be null after calling this method.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.GetNode``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the node at the given index, cast to the given node type.
member.exception: Throw if index is negative or >= Count.
Thrown if node at given index is not of the given type.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders nodes as a formula, using given outline setting.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation.
member.remarks: This will recursively call Render on all child nodes, and their children, etc.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.NodeCollection.ToString
member.summary: Returns the rendered formula, without outline formatting.

member.name: T:Formulacrum.BinaryOperatorNode

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the given properties.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.BinaryOperatorNode.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders node as a formula, using given outline setting.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation. Defaults to false.
member.remarks: This will recursively call Render on all child nodes, and their children, etc.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.BinaryOperatorNode.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this instance, but with no child nodes assigned.

member.summary: Sets the arguments to the given nodes, and returns this node.

member.exception: Thrown if index is negative or >= number of arguments.

member.summary: Operator symbol.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating if symbol is rendered before (true) or after (false) argument.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.UnaryOperatorNode.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders node as a formula, using given outline setting.
member.param: If true, formula will be rendered as an outline, with each node on a new line and each child node indented past its parent. If false, formula is rendered with no line breaks or indentation. Defaults to false.
member.remarks: This will recursively call Render on all child nodes, and their children, etc.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.UnaryOperatorNode.Clone

member.name: T:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode
member.summary: Formula node representing a reference with absolute coordinates.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new absolute reference node.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for first row.
member.exception: Top must have number greater than 0 and lower than Bottom.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for first column.
member.exception: Left must have number greater than 0 and lower than Right.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.RenderCoordinates(Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode)
member.summary: Gets a string representing the given row and column coordinate nodes.
member.param: The node representing the first row.
The node representing the first column.
The node representing the last row.
The node representing the last column.
member.returns: String representing the given row and column coordinates.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.ColumnNumberToLetters(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the given number converted to column letters for absolute coordinates, or empty string if given number is less than 1.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.AbsoluteReferenceNode.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new node with indentical properties to this node, but no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this node, but no child nodes assigned.

member.name: T:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode
member.summary: Base class for formula nodes representing references.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new reference node.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for first row.
member.exception: Top must have lower number than Bottom.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for first column.
member.exception: Left must have lower number than Right.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for last row.
member.exception: Bottom must have higher number than Top.
Bottom can only be used if Top is already assigned.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for last column.
member.exception: Right must have higher number than Left.
Right can only be used if Left is already assigned.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.SheetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for the worksheet.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.BookName
member.summary: Gets or sets the node for the workbook.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Children
member.summary: Gets collection of child nodes.
member.remarks: Order will be: BookName, SheetName, Top, Left, Bottom, Right.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.BookAndSheetPrefix
member.summary: Gets a string representing the workbook and worksheet of this reference.

member.name: P:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Coordinates
member.summary: Gets a string representing the row and column coordinates of this reference.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.RenderCoordinates(Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode)
member.summary: Gets a string representing the given row and column coordinate nodes.
member.param: The node representing the first row.
The node representing the first column.
The node representing the last row.
The node representing the last column.
member.returns: String representing the given row and column coordinates.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.Render(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the rendered formula.
member.remarks: Result will be composed of BookAndSheetPrefix followed by Coordinates.
member.param: Has no effect for reference nodes.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.ReferenceNode.SetCoordinates(Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode)
member.summary: Sets the coordinate nodes of this instance to the given nodes, then returns this node.

member.name: T:Formulacrum.RelativeReferenceNode
member.summary: Formula node representing relative references.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.RelativeReferenceNode.RenderCoordinates(Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode,Formulacrum.IntNode)
member.summary: Gets a string representing the given row and column coordinate nodes.
member.param: The node representing the first row.
The node representing the first column.
The node representing the last row.
The node representing the last column.
member.returns: String representing the given row and column coordinates.

member.name: M:Formulacrum.RelativeReferenceNode.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new node with indentical properties to this node, but no child nodes assigned.
member.returns: New node with identical properties to this node, but no child nodes assigned.
